text: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

text: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: A fool and his money are soon elected.
author: Will Rogers

text: I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful.
author: Marilyn Monroe
